20101231020650.000|20101231020651.000|CC1|MARKETS RIGHT NOW?

20101231020700.000|20101231020704.000|CC1|TUNE OF $90 BILLION SINCE MARCH

20101231020732.000|20101231020733.000|CC1|UNDERSTAND WHAT HAPPENED IN MAY

20101231020756.000|20101231020757.000|CC1|>> Brown: ARE WE BEGINNING TO   
20101231020757.000|20101231020759.000|CC1|SEE CHANGES THERE AS PEOPLE

20101231020801.000|20101231020803.000|CC1|EARNING MUCH ANYWHERE ELSE,

20101231020803.000|20101231020803.000|CC1|>> INDEED.

20101231020811.000|20101231020814.000|CC1|BUT IT'S ALSO, WHEN THE LITTLE  
20101231020814.000|20101231020816.000|CC1|GUY COMES IN INSTITUTIONS SAY   
20101231020816.000|20101231020818.000|CC1|THAT'S WHEN THEY GET OUT, THAT'S
20101231020818.000|20101231020820.000|CC1|A SIGN THAT THE MOM AND POP     
20101231020820.000|20101231020822.000|CC1|INVESTOR HAS A PEN CHANT FOR    
20101231020822.000|20101231020824.000|CC1|SELLING AT THE LOWS AND BUYING

20101231020826.000|20101231020827.000|CC1|OPPOSITE OF WHAT YOU'RE SUPPOSED
20101231020827.000|20101231020829.000|CC1|TO DO AND NOT BEING THICK       
20101231020829.000|20101231020830.000|CC1|SKINNED ENOUGH TO RIDE IT OUT.  
20101231020830.000|20101231020832.000|CC1|A COUPLE OF MUTUAL FUND         
20101231020832.000|20101231020833.000|CC1|COMPANIES HAVE DONE STUDIES THAT
20101231020833.000|20101231020835.000|CC1|IF YOU JUST SUCK --             
20101231020835.000|20101231020837.000|CC1|STUCK THE COURSE AND DIDN'T     
20101231020837.000|20101231020839.000|CC1|CANCEL YOUR 401 K CONTRIBUTIONS

20101231022442.000|20101231022443.000|CC1|CHUNK OF ALL GIVING IS BEING    
20101231022443.000|20101231022445.000|CC1|DONE THROUGH SOCIAL MEDIA?      
20101231022445.000|20101231022447.000|CC1|>> SO THE PERCENTAGE OF GIVING  
20101231022447.000|20101231022449.000|CC1|ONLINE AND THROUGH SOCIAL MEDIA 
20101231022449.000|20101231022452.000|CC1|IS RISING VERY QUICKLY, BUT     
20101231022452.000|20101231022453.000|CC1|STILL TO HAVE AN OVERALL        
20101231022453.000|20101231022455.000|CC1|PERSPECTIVE OF IT, RAY, IT'S    
20101231022455.000|20101231022456.000|CC1|STILL LESS THAN 10% OF ALL      
20101231022456.000|20101231022459.000|CC1|GIVING.

20101231023010.000|20101231023013.000|CC1|GIVING.                         
20101231023013.000|20101231023014.000|CC1|>> THE FOOD BUSINESS LITERALLY

20101231023234.000|20101231023235.000|CC1|>> Reporter: FROM SHINING HOPE

20101231023237.000|20101231023238.000|CC1|THAT COMBATS INTERGENERATIONAL  
20101231023238.000|20101231023241.000|CC1|CYCLES OF POVERTY IN KENYA      
20101231023241.000|20101231023242.000|CC1|TO THE FIDELCO GUIDE DOG        
20101231023242.000|20101231023243.000|CC1|FOUNDATIONS' GERMAN SHEPPARD    
20101231023243.000|20101231023245.000|CC1|GUIDE DOG PROGRAM FOR VETERANS, 
20101231023245.000|20101231023247.000|CC1|NEWMAN'S OWN FOUNDATION SUPPORTS
20101231023247.000|20101231023247.000|CC1|NON-PROFITS AROUND THE WORLD AND
20101231023247.000|20101231023249.000|CC1|HERE AT HOME.                   
20101231023249.000|20101231023251.000|CC1|ONE HIGH PROFILE EXAMPLE OF THE 
20101231023251.000|20101231023252.000|CC1|PHILANTHROPY OF NEWMAN'S OWN IS 
20101231023252.000|20101231023254.000|CC1|THE HOLE IN THE WALL GANG CAMP, 
20101231023254.000|20101231023255.000|CC1|WHICH PAUL NEWMAN FOUNDED IN    
20101231023255.000|20101231023301.000|CC1|1988 IN ASHFORD, CONNECTICUT.   
20101231023301.000|20101231023302.000|CC1|>> PAUL NEWMAN HAD THE IDEA OF  
20101231023302.000|20101231023303.000|CC1|CREATING A PLACE WHERE CHILDREN 
20101231023303.000|20101231023305.000|CC1|WHOSE LIVES HAD BEEN TURNED     
20101231023305.000|20101231023310.000|CC1|UPSIDE DOWN WITH SERIOUS ILLNESS
20101231023310.000|20101231023311.000|CC1|COULD FIND A SAFE PLACE IN WHICH
20101231023311.000|20101231023312.000|CC1|THEY COULD JUST BE THEMSELVES   
20101231023312.000|20101231023316.000|CC1|AND BE CHILDREN AGAIN.          
20101231023316.000|20101231023317.000|CC1|>> THE MOST INTERESTING THING,  
20101231023317.000|20101231023318.000|CC1|ASIDE FROM JUST WATCHING        
20101231023318.000|20101231023320.000|CC1|CHILDREN THAT HAVE HAD THE BAD  
20101231023320.000|20101231023322.000|CC1|LUCK OF BEING HIT WITH A... A   
20101231023322.000|20101231023324.000|CC1|LIFE THREATENING DISEASE, THE   
20101231023324.000|20101231023326.000|CC1|RECIPROCITY THAT OCCURS BETWEEN 
20101231023326.000|20101231023327.000|CC1|THE CAMPERS AND THE STAFF       
20101231023327.000|20101231023336.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20101231023336.000|20101231023337.000|CC1|THE CHILDREN DEMAND A LOT BUT   
20101231023337.000|20101231023340.000|CC1|THE REWARD THAT COMES FROM THE  
20101231023340.000|20101231023344.000|CC1|CAREGIVER IS, IS EQUAL TO WHAT, 
20101231023344.000|20101231023345.000|CC1|YOU GIVE AS MUCH AS YOU GET, AND
20101231023345.000|20101231023345.000|CC1|THAT WAS SOMETHING OF AN        
20101231023345.000|20101231023353.000|CC1|ASTONISHMENT.                   
20101231023353.000|20101231023354.000|CC1|WHAT COULD BE BETTER THAN TO    
20101231023354.000|20101231023356.000|CC1|HOLD YOUR HAND OUT TO PEOPLE WHO
20101231023356.000|20101231023359.000|CC1|ARE LESS FORTUNATE THAN YOU ARE?
20101231023359.000|20101231023401.000|CC1|THAT'S SIMPLY THE WAY I LOOK AT 
20101231023401.000|20101231023404.000|CC1|IT.                             
20101231023404.000|20101231023406.000|CC1|>> WHEN IT CAME TO PHILANTHROPY,

20101231024103.000|20101231024105.000|CC1|PROPERLY, YOU CAN'T HEAR THE    
20101231024105.000|20101231024106.000|CC1|VOICE OF THE PEOPLE ON THE

20101231024110.000|20101231024112.000|CC1|ONE ANOTHER.

20101231024922.000|20101231024923.000|CC1|>> Brown: FINALLY TONIGHT:      
20101231024923.000|20101231024925.000|CC1|WE REMEMBER BILLY TAYLOR-- JAZZ 
20101231024925.000|20101231024926.000|CC1|PIANIST, COMPOSER, EDUCATOR AND 
20101231024926.000|20101231024927.000|CC1|ADVOCATE WHO DIED TUESDAY IN NEW

20101231024935.000|20101231024937.000|CC1|VIEWERS, HE WAS DOCTOR BILLY    
20101231024937.000|20101231024939.000|CC1|TAYLOR-- THE PIANIST WHO ALSO   
20101231024939.000|20101231024942.000|CC1|HAD A PH.d IN MUSIC EDUCATION   
20101231024942.000|20101231024943.000|CC1|AND A PASSION FOR SPREADING HIS 
20101231024943.000|20101231024946.000|CC1|LOVE OF JAZZ.                   
20101231024946.000|20101231024948.000|CC1|>> I FEEL STRONGLY ABOUT THE    
20101231024948.000|20101231024949.000|CC1|ARTS.                           
20101231024949.000|20101231024951.000|CC1|AND I FEEL VERY STRONGLY ABOUT  
20101231024951.000|20101231024955.000|CC1|THE COUNTRY I LIVE IN.          
20101231024955.000|20101231024957.000|CC1|>> Brown: TAYLOR BEGAN HIS      
20101231024957.000|20101231024958.000|CC1|PROFESSIONAL CAREER IN NEW YORK 
20101231024958.000|20101231025000.000|CC1|IN 1943, EVENTUALLY SERVING AS  
20101231025000.000|20101231025002.000|CC1|HOUSE PIANIST AT BIRDLAND, THE  
20101231025002.000|20101231025004.000|CC1|LEGENDARY JAZZ CLUB AND PLAYING 
20101231025004.000|20101231025005.000|CC1|WITH MANY OF THE ERA'S GREATS,  
20101231025005.000|20101231025007.000|CC1|INCLUDING CHARLIE PARKER, DIZZY 
20101231025007.000|20101231025011.000|CC1|GILLESPIE AND MILES DAVIS.      
20101231025011.000|20101231025014.000|CC1|HE STARTED HIS OWN TRIO IN 1951 
20101231025014.000|20101231025016.000|CC1|AND ALSO BEGAN LECTURING AND    
20101231025016.000|20101231025018.000|CC1|WRITING ON JAZZ-- THE BEGINNINGS
20101231025018.000|20101231025021.000|CC1|OF DECADES OF WORK IN RADIO,    
20101231025021.000|20101231025022.000|CC1|TELEVISION AND SCHOOLS, BRINGING
20101231025022.000|20101231025030.000|CC1|JAZZ TO A WIDER AUDIENCE.       
20101231025030.000|20101231025031.000|CC1|>> WELCOME TO JAZZ ALIVE.       
20101231025031.000|20101231025032.000|CC1|>> Brown: HE WAS WELL-KNOWN IN  
20101231025032.000|20101231025034.000|CC1|THE PUBLIC BROADCASTING WORLD   
20101231025034.000|20101231025035.000|CC1|HOSTING SEVERAL PROGRAMS ON     
20101231025035.000|20101231025036.000|CC1|N.P.R. FROM THE 1970s UNTIL     
20101231025036.000|20101231025039.000|CC1|2002.                           
20101231025039.000|20101231025040.000|CC1|IN THE EARLY '80s, TAYLOR BECAME
20101231025040.000|20101231025042.000|CC1|A CORRESPONDENT FOR CBS "SUNDAY 
20101231025042.000|20101231025043.000|CC1|MORNING."                       
20101231025043.000|20101231025044.000|CC1|HE INTERVIEWED OTHER ARTISTS AND
20101231025044.000|20101231025045.000|CC1|ON OCCASION PLAYED MUSIC        
20101231025045.000|20101231025056.000|CC1|HIMSELF.                        
20101231025056.000|20101231025057.000|CC1|TAYLOR ALSO REACHED OUT TO YOUNG
20101231025057.000|20101231025059.000|CC1|PEOPLE IN NUMEROUS WAYS.        
20101231025059.000|20101231025101.000|CC1|HE TOOK HIS JAZZ MOBILE INTO NEW
20101231025101.000|20101231025102.000|CC1|YORK'S POORER NEIGBHORHOODS AND 
20101231025102.000|20101231025105.000|CC1|AROUND THE COUNTRY.             
20101231025105.000|20101231025106.000|CC1|AND WORKED WITH UP AND COMING   
20101231025106.000|20101231025108.000|CC1|MUSICIANS IN HIS ROLE AS        
20101231025108.000|20101231025109.000|CC1|ARTISTIC ADVISOR TO THE KENNEDY 
20101231025109.000|20101231025113.000|CC1|CENTER FOR THE PERFORMING ARTS. 
20101231025113.000|20101231025118.000|CC1|?                               
20101231025118.000|20101231025120.000|CC1|TAYLOR WAS THE RECIPIENT OF     
20101231025120.000|20101231025122.000|CC1|NUMEROUS HONORS AND AWARDS,     
20101231025122.000|20101231025123.000|CC1|INCLUDING THE NATIONAL MEDAL OF 
20101231025123.000|20101231025126.000|CC1|THE ARTS.                       
20101231025126.000|20101231025127.000|CC1|HE WROTE MORE THAN 300          
20101231025127.000|20101231025128.000|CC1|COMPOSITIONS INCLUDING "I WISH I
20101231025128.000|20101231025130.000|CC1|KNEW HOW IT WOULD FEEL TO BE    
20101231025130.000|20101231025131.000|CC1|FREE," WHICH BECAME AN ANTHEM OF
20101231025131.000|20101231025132.000|CC1|THE CIVIL RIGHTS MOVEMENT IN THE
20101231025132.000|20101231025136.000|CC1|1960s.                          
20101231025136.000|20101231025137.000|CC1|SHORTLY AFTER 9/11, THE BILLY   
20101231025137.000|20101231025139.000|CC1|TAYLOR TRIO PERFORMED THE PIECE 
20101231025139.000|20101231025142.000|CC1|AS PART OF A KENNEDY CENTER     
20101231025142.000|20101231025144.000|CC1|SPECIAL TITLED "A CONCERT FOR   
20101231025144.000|20101231025144.000|CC1|AMERICA".                       
20101231025144.000|20101231025152.000|CC1|? ?                             
20101231025152.000|20101231025153.000|CC1|BILLY TAYLOR WAS 89.            
20101231025153.000|20101231025228.000|CC1|? ?
